parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the application. You can call the ListApplication operation to query the application ID. For more information, see [ListApplicationlink](~~149390~~).

parameters.name: ScalingBehaviour
parameters.description: 配置自定义弹性行为，具体数据结构参考样例。

parameters.name: ScalingRuleEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the auto scaling policy. Valid values:

*   **true**: enables the auto scaling policy.
*   **false**: disables the auto scaling policy.

parameters.name: ScalingRuleName
parameters.description: The name of the auto scaling policy. The name must start with a lowercase letter, and can contain lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens (-). The name must be 1 to 32 characters in length.

parameters.name: ScalingRuleTrigger
parameters.description: The trigger policy for the auto scaling policy. Set the value in the JSON format by using the ScalingRuleTriggerDTO class. For more information, see Additional information about request parameters.

parameters.name: ScalingRuleType
parameters.description: The type of the auto scaling policy. Set the value to **trigger**.
